en: Please be mindfull handling sensitive data
da: Pas godt på og overvej nøje hvordan du håndterer personfølsomme data

en: The ***FreesearchR*** app only stores data for analyses, but please only use with sensitive data when running locally. [Read more here](https://agdamsbo.github.io/FreesearchR/#run-locally-on-your-own-machine).
da: ***FreesearchR*** opbevarer alene data i forbindelse med din analyse, men du bør kun behandle personfølsomme data når du kører ***FreesearchR*** direkte på din egen maskine. [Læs mere her](https://agdamsbo.github.io/FreesearchR/#run-locally-on-your-own-machine).
Vælg variabler til den endelige import

en: Choose your favourite output file format for further work, and download, when the analyses are done.
da: Vælge dit foretrukne dataformat, og hent data, når du er ærdig med databehandlingen.

en: The FreesearchR app only stores data for analyses, but please only use with sensitive data when running locally. Read more here
da: FreesearchR opbevarer alene data i forbindelse med din analyse, men du bør kun behandle personfølsomme data når du kører FreesearchR direkte på dine egen maskine. Læs mere her

en: Below, are several options for simple data manipulation like update variables by renaming, creating new labels (for nicer tables in the report) and changing variable classes (numeric, factor/categorical etc.).
da: Nedenfor er der mulighed for at lave simple ændringer i dit datasæt, såsom at redigere variabelnavne eller beskrivelser (bedre tabeller), eller omklassificering af variabler (numerisk, factoriel/kategorisk).

en: Please note that data modifications are applied before any filtering.
da: Bemærk at alle ændringer i data anvendes inden filtreringen.

en: Below options allow more advanced varaible manipulations.
da: Nedenfor er mulighed for avancerede ændringer i data.

en: Reorder the levels of factor/categorical variables.
da: Arranger rækkefølgen af niveauer i faktorielle/kategoriske variabler.

en: Create factor/categorical variable from a continous variable (number/date/time).
da: Opret kategorisk variabel på baggrund af kontinuert variabel (numerisk/dato/tid).

en: Create a new variable based on an R-expression.
da: Opret ny variabel baseret på R-kode.
Sammenlign ændret data med det originale datasæt

en: Raw print of the original vs the modified data.
da: Simpel sammenligning af det originale og det ændrede datasæt.

en: Enter an expression to define new column:
da: Indtast udregningen til at definere en ny variabel:

en: Click on a column name to add it to the expression:
da: Tryk på et variabel navn for at tilføje det til udregningen:

en: New column name cannot be empty
da: Det nye variabelnavn kan ikke være tomt

en: First five rows are shown below:
da: De første fem rækker vises nedenfor:

en: Upload a file, get data directly from REDCap or use local or sample data.
da: Upload en fil, hent data direkte fra en REDCap-server eller brug test-data eller lokal data.

en: Create a new variable (otherwise replaces the one selected)
da: Opret en ny variabel (ellers erstattes den oprindelige)

en: Date to use as origin to convert date/datetime:
da: Dato, der skal anvendes som udgangspunkt for konvertering af dato/datotid:
Du kan vælge mellem disse filtyper: {file_extensions_text}

en: You can choose between these file types:
da: Du kan vælge mellem følgene filtyper:

en: Rows to skip before reading data:
if several use a comma (',') to separate them
da: hvis flere, så anvend et komma (',') som seperator

en: {data_text} has {n} observations and {n_var} variables, with {n_complete} ({p_complete} %) complete cases.
da: {data_text} har {n} observationer og {n_var} variabler, med {n_complete} ({p_complete} %) komplette cases.

en: At 0, only complete variables are included; at 100, all variables are included.
da: Ved 0 inkluderes alene komplette variabler; ved 100 inkluderes alle variabler.

en: The following variable pairs are highly correlated: {sentence_paste(.x,and_str)}.\nConsider excluding one {more}from the dataset to ensure variables are independent.
da: De følgende variabel-par er stærkt korrelerede: {sentence_paste(.x,and_str)}.\nOvervej at fjerne en {more}fra datasættet for at sikre at prædiktorer er internt uafhængige.

en: No variables have a correlation measure above the threshold.
da: Ingen variabler er korrelerede over den angivne tærskelværdi.

en: Only non-text variables are available for plotting. Go the "Data" to reclass data to plot.
da: Kun variabler, der ikke er klassificerede som tekst er tilgængelige. Gå til fanen "Forbered" for at ændre klassifikationer.

en: Drawing the plot. Hold tight for a moment..
A classical way of visualising the distribution of an ordinal scale like the modified Ranking Scale and known as Grotta bars
da: En klassisk visualisering af fordelingen af observationer på en ordinal kategorisk skala. Typisk brugt til modified Rankin Scale og kendes også som 'Grotta bars'

en: A modern alternative to the classic boxplot to visualise data distribution
da: Moderne alternativ til den klassiske box-plot og velegnet til at visualisere fordelingen af observationer

en: A way of visualising change between groups
da: Visualiserer ændring mellem grupper for samme type observationer

en: A classic way of showing the association between to variables
A classic way to plot data distribution by groups
Generate area-proportional Euler diagrams to display set relationships
da: Generer proportionelt Euler-diagram for at vise forhold mellem forskellige kategoriske observationer

en: Data is only stored for analyses and deleted when the app is closed.
da: Data opbevares alene til brug i analyser og slettes så snart appen lukkes.

en: Data includes {n_pairs} pairs of highly correlated variables.
da: Der er {n_pairs} variabel-par, der er stærkt internt korrelerede.

en: Below you find a summary table for quick insigths, and on the right you can visualise data classes, browse observations and apply different data filters.
da: Nedenfor er en opsummerende tabel, der giver hurtigt overblik. Til højre kan du få et visuelt overblik, gennemgå observationer og oprette datafiltre.

en: The following error occured on determining correlations:
da: Følgende fejl opstod i forbindelse med korrelationsanalysen:

en: We encountered the following error creating your report:
da: Følgende fejl opstod, da rapporten blev dannet:

en: There is a total of {p_miss} % missing observations.
da: Der er i alt {p_miss} % manglende observationer.

en: Reset to original imported dataset. Careful! There is no un-doing.
da: Gendan det oprindeligt importerede datasæt. Forsigtig! Alle dine ændringer vil forsvinde.

en: Only factor/categorical variables are available for stratification. Go back to the 'Prepare' tab to reclass a variable if it's not on the list.
da: Alene kategoriske variabler kan danne grundlag for stratificering. Mangler du en variabel, så gå til "Forbered" og omklassificer til kategorisk.

en: To avoid evaluating the correlation of the outcome variable, this can be excluded from the plot or select 'none'.
da: For at udelukke svarvariablen fra korrelationsanalysen, så kan du vælge din svarvariabel eller vælge 'non', hvis du ikke vil angive en.

en: Set the cut-off for considered 'highly correlated'.
da: Angiv grænsen for. hvad, der tolkes som 'betydelig korrelation'.

en: Sure you want to reset data? This cannot be undone.
da: Er du sikker på at du vil gendanne data? Det kan ikke fortrydes.

en: This window is aimed at advanced users and require some *R*-experience!
da: Dette vindue er primært for avancerede brugere med nogen *R*-erfaring!

en: Here is an overview of how your data is interpreted, and where data is missing. Use this information to consider if data is missing at random or if some observations are missing systematically wich may be caused by an observation bias.
da: Her har du en oversigt over hvordan data er blevet formateret, og hvor der er manglende observationer. Brug informationen til at overveje om manglende data mangler tilfældigt eller og der er et mønster, som kan være et udtryk for systematisk manglende data (observationsbias).

en: If none are selected, all are included.
da: Hvis ingen er valgt inkluderes alle.

en: Press 'Analyse' to create the regression model and after changing parameters.
da: Tryk 'Analysér' for at danne regressionsmodel og for at opdatere hvis parametre ændres.

en: The token is a string of 32 numbers and letters.
da: En API-nøgle består af ialt 32 tal og bogstaver.

en: Select fields/variables to import and click the funnel to apply optional filters
da: Vælg variabler, der skal importeres og tryk på tragten for at anvende valgfrie filtre
Tryk for at se metadata (Data Dictionary)

en: Data retrieved, but it looks like only the ID was retrieved from the server. Please check with your REDCap administrator that you have required permissions for data access.
da: Data er hentet, men det ser ud til kun at indeholde ID-variablen. Du skal kontakte din REDCap-administrator og sikre dig at du har adgang til faktisk at hente de udvalgte data.

en: Data retrieved, but it looks like not all requested fields were retrieved from the server. Please check with your REDCap administrator that you have required permissions for data access.
da: Data er hentet, men det ser ud til kun at indeholde nogle af de udvalgte variabler. Du skal kontakte din REDCap-administrator og sikre dig at du har adgang til faktisk at hente de udvalgte data.

en: Click to see the imported data
da: Tryk for at se de importerede data

en: Import a dataset from an environment
da: Importer et datasæt fra et kodemiljø

en: Use a dataset from your environment or from the environment of a package.
da: Brug et datasæt fra dit lokale kodemiljø eller fra en tilgængelig pakke.
Kovariabler, der skal omklassificeres som kategoriske
Vælg variabel til a stratificere tabellen
Vælg de modeller, der skal visualiseres

en: Creating regression models failed with the following error:
da: Oprettelsen af en regressionsmodel fejlede med den følgende besked:

en: Creating a regression table failed with the following error:
da: Oprettelsen af en regressionstabel fejlede med den følgende besked:

en: Saving the plot. Hold on for a moment..
Running model assumptions checks failed with the following error:
da: Tjek af antagelser for regressionsmodellen fejlede med den følgende besked:

en: Option to perform statistical comparisons between strata in baseline table.
da: Mulighed for at udføre statistiske tests mellem strata i oversigtstabellen.

en: Press 'Evaluate' to create the comparison table.
da: Tryk 'Evaluér' for at oprette en oversigtstabel.

en: The data includes {n_col} variables. Please limit to 100.
da: Data indeholder {n_col} variabler. Begræns venligst til 100.
Datasættet uden variabler formateret som tekst

en: Creating the table. Hold on for a moment..
Generating the report. Hold on for a moment..
We encountered the following error showing missingness:
da: Under analysen af manglende observationer opstod følgende fejl:

en: We encountered the following error browsing your data:
da: I forsøget på at vise en dataoversigt opstod følgende fejl:

en: Choose a name for the column to be created or modified, then enter an expression before clicking on the button below to create the variable, or cancel to exit without saving anything.
da: Vælg et navn til den nye variabel, skriv din formel og tryk så på knappen for at gemme variablen, eller annuler for at lukke uden at gemme.

en: Please fill in web address and API token, then press 'Connect'.
da: Udfyld serveradresse og API-nøgle, og tryk så 'Fobind'.

en: There are more advanced options to modify factor/categorical variables as well as create new factor from an existing variable or new variables with R code. At the bottom you can restore the original data.
da: Der er mere avancerede muligheder for at ændre kategoriske variable, oprette nye kategoriske variabler fra eksisterende data eller nye variable baseret på R-kode. Nederst kan du gendanne originale data.

en: No character variables with accepted delimiters detected.
da: No character variables with accepted delimiters detected.

en: Text or character to split string by
da: Text or character to split string by

en: Split string to multiple columns. Keep number of rows.
da: Split string to multiple columns. Keep number of rows.

en: Split string to multiple observations (rows) in the same column. Also ads id and instance columns
da: Split string to multiple observations (rows) in the same column. Also ads id and instance columns

en: Split a text column by a recognised delimiter.
da: Split a text column by a recognised delimiter.

en: Split a character string by a common delimiter
da: Split a character string by a common delimiter

en: Create relative stacked barplots to show the distribution of categorical levels
da: Create relative stacked barplots to show the distribution of categorical levels

en: Create side-by-side barplot to show the distribution of categorical levels
da: Create side-by-side barplot to show the distribution of categorical levels

en: Missings across variables by the variable **'{input$missings_var}'**
da: Missings across variables by the variable **'{input$missings_var}'**

en: Missing vs non-missing observations in the variable **'{input$missings_var}'**
da: Missing vs non-missing observations in the variable **'{input$missings_var}'**

en: Evaluate missingness by either comparing missing values across variables (optionally grouped by af categorical or dichotomous variable) or compare variables grouped by the missing status (missing or not) of an outcome variable. If there is a significant difference i the missingness, this may cause a bias in you data and should be considered carefully interpreting the data and analyses as data may not be missing at random.
da: Evaluate missingness by either comparing missing values across variables (optionally grouped by af categorical or dichotomous variable) or compare variables grouped by the missing status (missing or not) of an outcome variable. If there is a significant difference i the missingness, this may cause a bias in you data and should be considered carefully interpreting the data and analyses as data may not be missing at random.

en: Calculating. Hold tight for a moment..
da: Calculating. Hold tight for a moment..

en: Overview of difference in variables by missing status in outcome
da: Overview of difference in variables by missing status in outcome

en: Select a variable for grouped overview
da: Select a variable for grouped overview

en: There is a significant difference in data missingness in {n_nonmcar} {ifelse(n_nonmcar==1,'variable','variables')} grouped by the selected outcome/grouping variable {outcome}.
da: There is a significant difference in data missingness in {n_nonmcar} {ifelse(n_nonmcar==1,'variable','variables')} grouped by the selected outcome/grouping variable {outcome}.

en: A free data analysis tool for clinicians, students, and learners
da: A free data analysis tool for clinicians, students, and learners

en: Filter, modify, and create new variables. Prepare your data efficiently for analysis.
da: Filter, modify, and create new variables. Prepare your data efficiently for analysis.

en: Create simple, clean plots for quick insights and overview
da: Create simple, clean plots for quick insights and overview

en: Build simple regression models for advanced analysis
da: Build simple regression models for advanced analysis

en: FreesearchR is available in multiple languages. To help with translations, please contact us at info@freesearchr.org
da: FreesearchR is available in multiple languages. To help with translations, please contact us at info@freesearchr.org

en: Start with FreesearchR for basic data evaluation and analysis.
da: Start with FreesearchR for basic data evaluation and analysis.

en: When you need more advanced tools, you'll be better prepared to use R directly.
da: When you need more advanced tools, you'll be better prepared to use R directly.

en: Run the FreesearchR app locally when working with sensitive data.
da: Run the FreesearchR app locally when working with sensitive data.

en: Load data from spreadsheets, REDCap servers, or try with sample data. Multiple sources supported for maximum flexibility.
da: Load data from spreadsheets, REDCap servers, or try with sample data. Multiple sources supported for maximum flexibility.

en: Evaluate data with descriptive analyses, inspect correlations, and review missing observations effectively.
da: Evaluate data with descriptive analyses, inspect correlations, and review missing observations effectively.

en: Export results directly to your text editor
da: Export results directly to your text editor

en: Save your processed datasets for later
da: Save your processed datasets for later

en: Learn and reproduce results in R
da: Learn and reproduce results in R

en: When you need more advanced tools, you'll be prepared to use R directly.
da: When you need more advanced tools, you'll be prepared to use R directly.
